import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; import { Upload, BarChart3, Lightbulb, Shield, Zap } from 'lucide-react'; const Home = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); const features = [ { icon: , title: 'Easy Upload', description: 'Upload your resume in PDF, DOC, or DOCX format with just a few clicks.' }, { icon: , title: 'Smart Analysis', description: 'AI-powered analysis extracts skills, experience, and provides detailed insights.' }, { icon: , title: 'Actionable Insights', description: 'Get personalized suggestions to improve your resume and increase your chances.' }, { icon: , title: 'Secure & Private', description: 'Your data is encrypted and stored securely. We respect your privacy.' } ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

AI-Powered Resume Analysis

Upload your resume and get intelligent insights, skill analysis, and personalized suggestions to make your resume stand out from the crowd.

{user ? ( Go to Dashboard ) : ( <> Get Started Free Sign In )}
{/* Features Section */}

Why Choose Our Resume Analyzer?

Our advanced AI technology provides comprehensive analysis and actionable insights to help you create the perfect resume.

{features.map((feature, index) => (
{feature.icon}

{feature.title}

{feature.description}

))}
{/* How It Works */}

How It Works

Simple steps to get your resume analyzed

1

Upload Resume

Upload your resume in PDF, DOC, or DOCX format

2

AI Analysis

Our AI analyzes your resume for skills, experience, and structure

3

Get Insights

Receive detailed analysis and personalized improvement suggestions

{/* CTA Section */}

Ready to Improve Your Resume?

Join thousands of professionals who have improved their resumes with our AI-powered analysis.

{user ? ( Analyze Your Resume ) : ( Start Free Analysis )}
); }; export default Home;
